fields.request: Manual QA: Confirm watchtower dashboard rule bypasses upstream requirement
fields.request_details:
1. Sign in to the Django admin and open /admin/.
2. Ensure the local node has the Watchtower role and no upstream nodes are configured.
3. Reload the dashboard and confirm the Nodes â†’ Nodes row shows a green check with the 'All rules met.' message despite lacking upstream nodes.
4. Restore any modified data.
